entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [monointerpreter] Array Set function doesn't validate matching element types on mono interpreter #107110
  • Attributes.GetCustomAttributesOnOpenGenericBaseTypeRetrievesDerivedAttributes test still fails on Mono #107095
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationToken.UnsafeRegisterWithoutImmediateInvoke #107094
    Future
  • Potentially missing await of requestBodyTask in Http2Connection #107082
    Future
  • JIT: We should be able to avoid covariance checks when inlining with exact types #107080
    10.0.0
  • SPMI: Update AzureKeyVault task #107078
    10.0.0
  • `ReaderWriterLockSlim.WaitingWriteCount` returns 0 if the write lock is entering as an upgrade from `UpgradableReadLock` #107077
    10.0.0
  • Switch recognition should not be lexical #107076
    10.0.0
  • Crash on reentry of tiered compilation #107074
  • [WASI] implement finalizer #107071
    10.0.0
  • [Question] Any plan to use roslyn source generator to make `EventSource` and `ActivitySource` easily? #107069
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.sh #107067
  • JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters still calls constructor with invalid values #107065
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Drop support for .NET Standard #107081
  • FreeBSD tests crash with HRESULT: 0x8007FF02 from #106724 #106892
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 6/3/2024 10:30:18 PM #103296
    9.0.0
  • Invalid Environment.ProcessorCount on AMD EPYC 9554. Shows 64 instead of 128 #106642
  • Audit OOB packages for trimming #107111
  • Why is it not supported on mono to set the value of function pointer through reflection #107070
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.CanCreateService #103548
    10.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException thrown by NullabilityInfoContext.Create(PropertyInfo) #107033
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #106949
    10.0.0
  • Upgrade native brotli to version 1.0.10 #106887
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 17 Regressions on 8/16/2024 4:29:39 PM #106707
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed `supportedInstructionSet.HasInstructionSet(InstructionSet.X64_AVX512F_VL)` #106450
    10.0.0
  • Bad error message when DOTNET_ROOT is set to x86 install of dotnet #3745
    Future
  • Backport GH105344 to .NET 8 #107088
    8.0.x
  • DateTime AddUnits & TimeSpan IntervalFromDoubleTicks rounding issues #107092
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Stream APIs - GetDirectSpan & ReadDirectSpan #107090
    Future
  • App Exception/Crashes Due to Windows Update #106829
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `AdvSimd.Insert` #106079
    9.0.0
  • Need to add logging mechanism to CompilationLibrary.ResolveReferencePaths #2979
    Future
  • [Question] Why the `Unsafe.SkipInit(out T)` is slowly than `T t = default`? #107068
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew is 12-4 times slower on Linux compared to Windows #31272
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.NumberHandlingTests_Default.Number_AsRootType_RoundTrip #106947
    9.0.0
  • ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount double counting IO completion work items #104284
    10.0.0
  • Divergent behavior of byte `&` operator #107062

PullRequests

Created

  • Change BuildWithFactoryReadDirect to not use RSA+MD5 #107119
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert stream override checks to `QCall` #107117
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Let the debugger knows DATAS is on #107115
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] pal init: Move InitializeFlushProcessWriteBuffers() after VIRTUALInitialize() #107114
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Fix RidAssetResolution test to open shared framework file with read share access #107112
    area-Host
  • [release/9.0] Extend timeout when waiting for service status #107109
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Make sure we can build with DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT not defined #107108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update AnyAll.cs (Add AnyAndNotNull Extension Methods) #107107
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Remove `BaseDomain::CreateSizedRefHandle` #107106
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #107103
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #107102
    area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Update docs about units for SizeLimit #107101
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • JIT: Use `ValueTuple` argument for SIMD type lookup for `AdvSimd.Store*` #107099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Give `Compiler` a proper constructor #107098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #107097
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WASI] finalizer + HTTP client child resources #107096
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #107093
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107089
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #107085
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107083
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • WIP: [mono][tvos] Do not treat assembly.pdb/xml files as native files to bundle when AOTing on Helix #107079
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107075
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • unnecessary assert when GetHeap is called in wait_for_gc_done #107073
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Propagate RuntimeConfiguration for cross-subset builds #107049
    area-Infrastructure
  • Code cleanup: Remove TODO to support genRetrunBB != nullptr #107087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • pal init: Move InitializeFlushProcessWriteBuffers() after VIRTUALInitialize() #107100
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark NoBackwardTimeZones as ConditionalFact #107086
    area-System.Runtime
  • Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #106994
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Extend timeout when waiting for service status #106998
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Minor changes to make it easier to sync diagnostic repo copy #107066
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update NativeImageEagerFixups lock acquiredbefore #107064
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move exposed assembly object and dynamic method table out of `DomainAssembly` #106911
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • ILLink: fix TypeProxy implementation of equality #106990
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make host error message include pointer to architecture for Windows library load failure with ERROR_BAD_EXE_FORMAT #107063
    area-Host
  • [WASI] WasiEventLoop to keep Task alive #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Performance sample - remove public nugets and clean up #107030
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106993
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-macos-sequoia (macOS15), 9.0.0
  • Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #106981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JIT/SPMI CodeQL issues #107056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop counting work items from ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue for ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount #106854
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0] Backport Azure Linux test changes #106980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] New cert loader should load into CNG by default #107060
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames from debugdebugger #107058
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Define a merged runner for the nativeaot subtree and run every test out-of-proc and don't reference the xunit generator #107002
    test-enhancement, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a public test version of the superpmi-collect pipeline #106960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use WeakReferences in the BF round trip test #106967
    area-System.Resources, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #107035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0][no-merge][testing][Android] Run runtime and libraries tests on different Android API version #106951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #106985
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix bug in validating unused bits #106771
    area-System.Memory
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Correct lengths of Chinese lunisolar calendar months 8 and 9 in 2057. #107038
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2526098 #106995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Disable event source in mobile sample apps #106880
    test-enhancement, os-android, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Allow side-effects for the first test in switch recognition #106988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
